meanings.definition: An increase or addition, especially one of a series.
meanings.sent1: Each day, the worker received a small increment in his salary.
meanings.sent2: The increment in the number of students attending the school was noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The party decorations grew with each increment of balloons added.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room, an increment of joy in the somber atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The incremental growth of the plant's leaves was a sign of its health.

meanings.definition: The amount by which something increases.
meanings.sent1: The increment in temperature was only a few degrees, but it made a difference.
meanings.sent2: She measured the increment of sugar needed for the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The increment of coins in his pocket jingled with each step.
meanings.sent4: The increment of knowledge gained from reading was immeasurable.
meanings.sent5: The increment of paint on the canvas transformed it into a masterpiece.
